Lyrics: Carry me home to see my kin

Where the skies are so blue
Lord, I'm coming home to you

Where the skies are so blue
Lord, I'm coming home to you

Where the skies are so blue
Lord, I'm coming home to you

Lyrics: Another day has almost come and gone

Lyrics: Are you ready to take the chance and risk it all?
